file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 74-21-02-04 - IGNITER LEAD - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL IGNITER LEAD - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/Install the igniter leads. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH engines. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 74-21-02-000-801-A IGNITER LEAD - REMOVAL ALL 74-21-02-400-801-A IGNITER LEAD - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 74-21-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-21-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. IGNITER LEAD - REMOVAL A. General (1) Each engine has two igniter leads (A and B). The igniter lead (A) is installed on the bottom igniter, and the igniter lead (B), is installed on the top igniter of the engine. (2) To remove the igniter leads, obey the instructions in the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine 414 Upper Cowling LH Engine 424 Upper Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Engine work area EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 74-21-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THE ENGINE START/STOP SWITCH IS IN THE “STOP” POSITION TO PREVENT AN ACCIDENTAL ENGINE OPERATION. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – POWERPLANT START 1/2. (2) For removal/installation of the igniter lead (A), open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). (3) For removal/installation of the igniter lead (B), remove the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: THE IGNITION SYSTEM VOLTAGE IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH AND CAN KILL OR CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS. MAKE SURE THAT THE IGNITION SYSTEM IS SET TO OFF FOR A MINIMUM OF SIX (6) MINUTES, BEFORE YOU START THE WORK ON THE IGNITION SYSTEM COMPONENTS. (1) Remove the igniter lead. Refer to the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 74-21-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-21-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. IGNITER LEAD - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To install the igniter lead, obey the instructions in latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine 414 Upper Cowling LH Engine 424 Upper Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Engine work area I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the igniter leads. Refer to the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 74-21-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400), if applicable. (2) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (3) Remove the workstand. (4) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close the applicable circuit breakers. • POWERPLANT START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 74-21-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
